# Admin User Full Attributes Configuration Test Fixture (REQ-5)
# Tests parsing of user accounts with all attribute types

# User with all connection types and GUI pages
login user admin * administrator
user attribute admin administrator=on connection=serial,telnet,ssh gui-page=dashboard,lan-map,config login-timer=3600

# User with encrypted password and limited permissions
login user operator encrypted $1$abcdefgh$ijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123
user attribute operator administrator=off connection=ssh,http gui-page=dashboard,lan-map login-timer=1800

# User with single connection type
login user readonly mypassword123
user attribute readonly administrator=off connection=ssh gui-page=dashboard login-timer=7200

# User with no GUI pages (CLI only)
login user cliuser clipass456
user attribute cliuser administrator=off connection=serial,telnet,ssh login-timer=900

# User with all connection types
login user fullaccess fullpass789
user attribute fullaccess administrator=on connection=serial,telnet,remote,ssh,sftp,http gui-page=dashboard,lan-map,config login-timer=0

# User with sftp access only
login user sftpuser sftppass
user attribute sftpuser administrator=off connection=sftp login-timer=600

# User with http (GUI) access only
login user webuser webpass123
user attribute webuser administrator=off connection=http gui-page=dashboard login-timer=1200

# User with remote (PPP) connection type
login user remoteuser remotepass
user attribute remoteuser administrator=off connection=remote login-timer=3600

# User with minimal attributes (defaults)
login user basicuser basicpass
user attribute basicuser administrator=off

# User with only administrator flag
login user superadmin superpass
user attribute superadmin administrator=on login-timer=0
